mapper.insert: insert into kkb_cart(memberId, beanId, beanCount) values(#{memberId}, #{beanId}, #{beanCount})
mapper.update: update kkb_cart set beanCount=#{beanCount} where cartId = #{cartId}
mapper.select: select * from kkb_cart where memberId = #{memberId} and beanId = #{beanId}
mapper.delete: delete from kkb_cart where memberId = #{memberId} and beanId = #{beanId}
